body_html:
Honestly, there wasn't much thought in terms of the total benefit for adding double support for these specific Ops- it was pretty much a random draw from this list in #1140. You can follow the discussion there to see the context.

That said, I still have more work on this to implement and register a GPU kernel. If you think my efforts are better spent on something else, I'm happy to close this for now and move on to something more beneficial.

body:
Honestly, there wasn't much thought in terms of the total benefit for adding double support for these specific Ops- it was pretty much a random draw from [this list](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/1140#issuecomment-227012645) in #1140. You can follow the discussion there to see the context.

That said, I still have more work on this to implement and register a GPU kernel. If you think my efforts are better spent on something else, I'm happy to close this for now and move on to something more beneficial.
